subproject.corporate outcome: Capacities of national and local institutions enhanced to scale up proven MDG acceleration interventions and to plan, monitor, report and evaluate the MDG progress in the context of related national development priorities
subproject.description: The project aims at supporting the strengthening of SEPPIR in order to empower the Secretariat to perform monitoring functions regarding international agreements for racial equity and he fight against racial discrimination. The project aims to support the development of tools that will help SEPPIR to comply with their mandate, such as: mapping of afrodescendent communities, elaboration of databases and management systems for those communities, studies on public policies (especially on those referring to employment and violence), trainings on project management to its partners, between other actions.
subproject.title: BRA/07/010 - Support SEPPIR
